host.description: The guid of the host the interface is associated with.

network.description: The guid of the it:network the interface connected to.

mac.description: The ethernet (MAC) address of the interface.

ipv4.description: The IPv4 address of the interface.

ipv6.description: The IPv6 address of the interface.

phone.description: The telephone number of the interface.

wifi:ssid.description: The wifi SSID of the interface.

wifi:bssid.description: The wifi BSSID of the interface.

adid.description: An advertising ID associated with the interface.
